code:
/*
Language: Test Anything Protocol
Description: TAP, the Test Anything Protocol, is a simple text-based interface between testing modules in a test harness.
Requires: yaml.js
Author: Sergey Bronnikov <sergeyb@bronevichok.ru>
Website: https://testanything.org
*/function tap(hljs){return{name:'Test Anything Protocol',case_insensitive:true,contains:[hljs.HASH_COMMENT_MODE,// version of format and total amount of testcases
{className:'meta',variants:[{begin:'^TAP version (\\d+)$'},{begin:'^1\\.\\.(\\d+)$'}]},// YAML block
{begin:/---$/,end:'\\.\\.\\.$',subLanguage:'yaml',relevance:0},// testcase number
{className:'number',begin:' (\\d+) '},// testcase status and description
{className:'symbol',variants:[{begin:'^ok'},{begin:'^not ok'}]}]};}module.exports=tap;
